titles.title: Leveraging Artificial Intelligence to Streamline the Code of Federal Regulations Act of 2025
Leveraging Artificial Intelligence to Streamline the Code of Federal Regulations Act of 2025
A bill to require the use of artificial intelligence to review agency regulations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
